location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Captain Henry Hardy, in charge at Bushire to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Bombay Government that Captain Hardy has received a reply from Ḥusayn ‘Alī Mirzā, Prince at Sheraz, on the subject of his intended attack on Bahrain and a boat detained at Nakhelloo; it notes that as Ephraim Gerrish Stannus is expected to arrive shortly, he will take no further action in this area prior to his arrival.
